entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to Locate .NET MAUI in VS #16590
  • Large views with shadow disappear during RotateY animation #16587
  • RotationY behaviour is different between iOS and Android #16586
  • Google maps not displaying anything after clearing data #16585
  • Lottie animation does not behave as expected inside CollectionView.EmptyView #16584
    Backlog
  • CollectionView's selected item and another control bound to the same property behave incorrectly #16582
  • SearchBar Focused and Unfocused not working on iOS #16580
    Backlog
  • CarouselView - The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #16577
    Backlog
  • IOS 14+: TabBar disappears after Long-press back button #16576
    Backlog
  • Windows TabBar Icons do not use the correct color #16575
    Backlog
  • "System.ArgumentException: NaN is not a valid value for height" from `Rect.Size` getter #16571

Closed

  • Android crash when tapping button rendered outside of container #14317
    Backlog
  • Invalid URI: The Uri string is too long. - NET MAUI #16434
    Backlog
  • ControlTemplate ignored on ContentPage #5836
  • Setter using DynamicResource is not reapplied when related trigger condition is updated #13585
    Backlog
  • Error "NSInternalInconsistencyException Reason: Invalid update: invalid number of sections" in CollectionView on iOS still not closed #16438
  • TapGestureRecognizer not respecting the NumberOfTapsRequired property #13189
    Backlog
  • Disabled VisualState not working in VisualStateManager of Button #16562
  • [Bug] [Windows] File Picker Crashes After File Not Found #16068
    Backlog
  • Binding Content Not Showing in SwipeView (Used Inside CollectionView) #16567
  • [Bug] CodeBehind source generator breaks when use the `x:TypeArguments` #2304
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • Make Android visual test screenshots more deterministic #16591
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in DatePicker #16589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, memory-leak 💦
  • 'pwsh' is broken on net8 #16588
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Display alerts on top of popups #16581
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 branch #16527
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #16474
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • add unit test for #13585 #16578
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.6.3 to 17.7.0 #16583
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Use same type converter for Brush as for Color to enable XAML completion #16559
    area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16536
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [SourceGen] Support genric types from XML namespaces #16486
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8
  • [C] fix Specificity for VSM #16404
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Add doc comments for common types used in templates, maps, webview #16552
    area/docs 📓, t/docs 📝, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, Under Consideration
  • Locate MAUI View for PlatformView #16463
    area/architecture
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, Under Consideration
  • Add swipe gesture for uitests #16560
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker, Under Consideration
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
    .NET 7 + Servicing
